title: Remote Access
text: Margot can access a wide range of books and resources from anywhere in the world, which is convenient for her frequent travels.

title: Variety of Resources
text: Online libraries often provide access to a vast collection of digital books, journals, and articles that might not be available in physical libraries.

title: Time Efficiency
text: Using an online library can save time as Margot doesn't need to physically visit a library to borrow or return books.

hintAnswer: She can access the books remotely
title: Correct Choice
text: Margot can access the books remotely, which is ideal for her frequent travels.
choices: She can access the books remotely
She only needs books in the public domain
Only online libraries have free books
She needs to use books written by an author who's still living
